name: Rycerze Mroku
overview: Twilight Knights (Polish title: Rycerze Mroku, released 1997) is a first person perspective fantasy martial art game. The goal of the game is to defeat the evil minions and save the world. Each duel is preceded by a text introduction and animation of opponent's skills. The fight itself takes place in a FPP one screen view. The player may release a few types of attacks and defensive moves. The characters are described by two indicators - energy level (falls after each hit) and the level of reflexes (falls during the attack). This English version of Rycerze Mroku was originally meant to be released in 1997 outside of Poland as a shareware game. It was never released though, but in 2006 the author granted permission for the game to be made available for download.
